  • Element
com.inepex.hyperconnector.annotations

Annotation Type RowKeyBasedSearchMethod


  • public @interface RowKeyBasedSearchMethod
    Defines a row key based search method (select and/or delete).
    Author:
    Gabor Dicso

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String nameBase
      The base of the method name.
      SearchResultTypes resultType
      The result type of the search method.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean allowRegExp
      Specifies if a regular expression may also be passed as parameter and should be used in the search.
      boolean allowStartsWith
      Specifies if a row key prefix may also be passed as parameter and should be used in the search as a "starts with" search parameter for the row key.
      boolean delete
      Indicates if deleting entries should be enabled with the given method.
      int fixedRowLimit
      Only used if rowLimitType is set to FIXED.
      java.lang.String lastSearchFieldName
      Specifies the last field to be used as search parameter in the search method.
      SearchParamTypes lastSearchFieldParamType
      Specifies the type of the last search field.
      RowLimitTypes rowLimitType
      The row limit handling type of the search method.
      boolean select
      Indicates if selecting entries should be enabled with the given method.
      boolean specifyTimestamp
      Sets if the timestamp of the searched HyperEntity must be specified.

    • Element Detail

      • nameBase

        public abstract java.lang.String nameBase
        The base of the method name. Must be unique for the HyperEntity. Select methods will be prefixed with "select". Delete methods will be prefixed with "delete".

      • resultType

        public abstract SearchResultTypes resultType
        The result type of the search method. Select method: specifies the returned value. Delete method: deletes the value that is returned by the select method.

      • delete

        public abstract boolean delete
        Indicates if deleting entries should be enabled with the given method.
        Default:
        true

      • select

        public abstract boolean select
        Indicates if selecting entries should be enabled with the given method.
        Default:
        true

      • lastSearchFieldName

        public abstract java.lang.String lastSearchFieldName

        Specifies the last field to be used as search parameter in the search method. Last here means that taking the row key fields in the order set by the RowKeyField annotations, we only use the field specified by lastSearchFieldName and the fields preceding it. The last search field may have a discrete value or a range. The search method's parameters must contain a fixed value for all search fields preceding it.

        If lastSearchFieldName is set to an empty string, the search will match all rows.

        Default:
        ""

      • lastSearchFieldParamType

        public abstract SearchParamTypes lastSearchFieldParamType
        Specifies the type of the last search field. Used only if lastSearchFieldName is set to the name of a row key field (i.e. is not set to an empty string).
        Default:
        com.inepex.hyperconnector.annotations.SearchParamTypes.DISCRETE

      • specifyTimestamp

        public abstract boolean specifyTimestamp
        Sets if the timestamp of the searched HyperEntity must be specified. If set to true, search results will be filtered by the timestamp of the Hypertable cell(s).
        Default:
        false

      • rowLimitType

        public abstract RowLimitTypes rowLimitType
        The row limit handling type of the search method.
        Default:
        com.inepex.hyperconnector.annotations.RowLimitTypes.NONE

      • fixedRowLimit

        public abstract int fixedRowLimit
        Only used if rowLimitType is set to FIXED. Specifies the fixed row limit value to be used in this case.
        Default:
        0

      • allowRegExp

        public abstract boolean allowRegExp
        Specifies if a regular expression may also be passed as parameter and should be used in the search.
        Default:
        false

      • allowStartsWith

        public abstract boolean allowStartsWith
        Specifies if a row key prefix may also be passed as parameter and should be used in the search as a "starts with" search parameter for the row key. Makes primarily sense with no additional search parameters specified (maybe except for a regexp).
        Default:
        false
